components.title: Headforwards is a software development outsourcing company that builds strong relationships with clients in order to deliver exceptional software.
components.text: Being true to the principals of an Agile methodology brings benefits to both clients and the people who work in the business.

components.title: People over process
components.text: Developers are recruited specifically for a clients needs and teams are self-organising with the responsibility of producing software that delivers business value.

components.quote: It's about picking the right people for each client, rather than running a bench.
components.name: Craig Girvan

components.text: Headforwards aim to provide early and continuous delivery of useful software and be flexible in its response to changing requirements.

components.quote: If something changes in our clients world, they've got to adapt, they've got to look for a new competitive advantage in their software.

components.title: Building partnerships with clients
components.text: Headforwards looks to develop trust between themselves and their clients by continuously delivering business value.

components.quote: We want to be a partner to our clients, to develop long-term relationships with trust on both sides.
components.name: Toby Parkins
